channel.title: image-generation on Onebite Dev
channel.description: Recent content in image-generation on Onebite Dev

item.title: Play with Image generation tool: MidJourney, Dall-E 2 and Stable Diffusion (DreamStudio)
item.description: I was stunned, the first time I saw Dall-E 2. I really want to use it. While waiting for the beta invitation. I got my hand on other image generation, such as: StableDiffusion (via dream studio) and Midjourney. This is not a comparing blog post between the three. It’s just my raw result from my experience. Midjourney Easy UI. Very fun to play in discord. The image is not as accurate as I want though StableDiffusion (via Dream Studio) Image is very far from what I want Found a local-installation (no credit applied?
